content: Mors has some advice for the ecosystem. Go talk to him!
I should choose different types of freshwater fish from my backpack and place them in the Eco-Tank for ecological observation.
Bring the Lotusbreeze Lantern, Cloudherder's Chair, and a medium-sized utility table to Dorjelang.
Bhadra is settling in with his new furniture, and it seems to have reignited the inspiration he got from hitchhiking trips. I should wait until tomorrow to talk to him about it.
Open your Backpack and find a spot to place the Blueprint: Little Gathering.
I've brought the new furniture to Dorjelang. Time to stop by his place and hear what he thinks.
I'm helping Medowlyn prepare her furniture: Buy a Blue Mosaic Porcelain Bathtub from Glenn, and craft a Fluffy Clouds Sofa and a perfectly-sized table at the DIY Bench.
I should hand the quartz to Glenn and go over the next steps for building his shop.
The shop's ready! Let's go check it out and see how shopping works now.
So they were wild tomatoes all along? I should show them to Yunguo.
Mobai seems lost in thought in front of Loomi Mart at the camp, thinking about life on the planet. I should go talk to him about the Store in Loomi Mart.
Open the map and look for the visitor. Meet them and bring them back to the Camp.
Delete initial and create task furniture
Yunguo wants to provide the best growth conditions for the passion fruit, and there's a lot of work to be done. I should bring her the mysterious pile.
I should head to the Camp with Mobai and Esassani.
I should hand the raw timber to Glenn and go over the next steps for building his shop.
Talk to Esassani and embark on a Starsea Voyage!
Esassani needs more tools for the car mod. I should learn the Inspo Card: Pink Toolbox, then craft one at the DIY Bench.
The visitor is full and in good spirits. I should talk to him about the "Best Bud" he's looking for.
Some Neighbors who aren't great at cooking are happy to pay well for a proper meal. I should hand over the Fruit Medley Cake and Crispy Grilled Fish to Mobai.
All materials for the Luminescent Stone House are ready and construction is in full swing. I should come back tomorrow to check on Bhadra's Luminescent Stone House.
Mobai has prepared three basic pieces of furniture for my new home. I'll select them from my Backpack and decorate the house.
The Luca Arbor has grown, and new life has appeared on the planet! I should talk to Mobai and give the planet a name.
Glenn asked for my help collecting materials to build his shop. Time to grab my mattock, chop some trees, and collect raw timber.
Collect some creatures from the Islets and release them back on my planet!
The Luca Arbor's Next Growth Stage
Delete initial and create task furniture
I've brought the new furniture to Medowlyn. Time to stop by her place and hear what she thinks.
Completion condition: Approach NPC to trigger cutscene
How dare that crab bully Yunguo! I will catch it and avenge her!
Yunguo looks really down in front of the malnourished crop by her doorstep. I'll go talk to her and see what's wrong.
I'll go inside my new home and talk to Mobai, who's paying a visit.
Mobai has found the perfect spot on the hill to watch the meteor shower. I'll set up a Simple Wooden Ramp by the cliff so I can reach the hilltop.
Yunguo wants to provide the best growth conditions for the passion fruit, and there's a lot of work to be done. I should help craft a mysterious pile at the DIY Bench.
Second Batch of Shop Building Materials
Talk to Glenn and collect the Building Kit for the shop.
Give the Pink Toolbox to Esassani so she can modify the car and install the Lumia Battery.
Yunguo's sitting in the shallows? I'd better check what's going on.
Mors has some new advice for the ecosystem. Go talk to him!
Use the shovel from the Tool Wheel to dig a hole, then plant the rice seeds from my Backpack.
I found a colored Archiboo! I'll talk to Mobai and learn about the five different colors of Archiboos.
Wait for the Insectarium to Be Completed
The Food Fair was a success! I should return to Camp, talk to Mobai about how it went, and receive a new Jar of Luca.
Thousand Trains CS + Sani's Debut + Character Customization
Glenn's got everything prepared and stocked, and the grand opening is just around the corner! Let's talk to Glenn and check out Glenn's Stall.
I had a strange and fluffy dream! It seems time here is now in sync with reality. I'll head to the Camp and start my day.
The Crop Harvest Fair was a success! I'll go talk to Yunguo about how it went.
The Luca Arbor's Next Growth Stage
Visit Dorjelang's home and see what he thinks of the new furniture.
The security system in the Omni-Gallery has recorded several sets of unusual entry data lately, and Mors is asking for help. I should head to the Omni-Gallery and talk to him.
Yunguo's finished everything. Time to give it another try! I should wait until tomorrow to visit her place and see the passion fruit plant bear fruit.
A Mysterious Visitor from the Sky
My Bond Level with the new Neighbor has changed! I can invite them to settle via Starcove, or do it in person.
Yunguo has made some progress growing crops on the planet! I should go talk to her and pick up a few farming tips.
Let's Go Watch the Meteor Shower
Glenn is filled with expectations for the planetary trade and has been working tirelessly as a result. This vitality has crystallized into a Luca Fruit. I should talk to Glenn about it.
Completion Condition: Hang up the phone
Prepare and Give the Furniture to Bhadra
Would you like to build a house and create furniture?
By observing the creatures on the planet, I can better understand their living environment. I should equip the fishing rod from my Tool Wheel and catch different kinds of freshwater fish.
Esassani offered to help me gear up for future adventures. I should talk to her about modifying the car for long-distance journeys.
How dare that crab bully Yunguo! I will catch it and avenge her!
Work with Mors to begin research on saltwater fish. Use the fishing rod from the Tool Wheel to catch more kinds of saltwater fish.
Prepare for the Meteor Shower Gathering
Another mysterious visitor has been spotted on the planet. I should open the map, find the visitor, and talk to them.
Yunguo has prepared a BFF gift for me. I'll talk to her about it.
I should bring the delicious meat dish to Bhadra. It might bring us a bit closer.
Invite Residents to join the meteor shower inspection
Bring the Red Panda Cushioned Chair, Faintglow Stars Bookshelf, and a medium-sized utility table to Frostia.
I should open my Backpack and use the Building Kit from Loomi Co. to choose a spot and build my house.
Time to take a short break, then head to the Camp for the dinner party.
As the Luca Arbor grows, new life is emerging on the planet! I should talk to Mobai about what more we can do to help the planet thrive.
Everything is in place and the new house is under construction. It should be finished by tomorrow.
Talk to Mobai about the new acquaintance from the Starsea

Learn Recipe: Mushroom Soup.
Cook Mushroom Soup using 2 mushrooms at the Cooking Counter.
Got a call from Medowlyn. She wants to meet me outside her house for a chat.

I'm helping Bhadra prepare his furniture: Buy a Marble Square Table from Glenn, and craft a Maizeglow Table Lamp and an Azure Firefly Sofa at the DIY Bench. Once everything's ready, I should hand them over to him.

Yunguo kept trying to grow the mysterious crop, but it only produced a malnourished fruit. With my encouragement, she's finally asking Mors for help. I'll pick the fruit and take it to the Omni-Gallery.
The fruit is ready! Time to give it to Mobai at the Camp and learn how to brew tea.
The Lucaseed can nourish the planet and help it grow. I should take it to the plot at the Camp and plant it.
The Omni-Gallery is adding an Insectarium that'll be ready tomorrow. Creature settlement goes on as usual, and I can keep handing any new ones I catch over to Mors.
Delete initial and create task furniture
The security system at the Omni-Gallery has logged several visits from Yunguo to the Aquarium. I should head there and talk with her to see what's going on.
Yunguo lost the talisman her Gran'mama gave her, and a grass carp swallowed it?! I'll catch it in the river and bring it back to her.
Outdoor painting complete! I'll go talk to Glenn and share how it felt.
Plant 20 lilies on the main island!
Equip the watering bucket from the Tool Wheel to water the rice paddy.
Wait until tomorrow to harvest the rice.
I've completed a planet growth event and collected a jar full of Luca. Time to water the Luca Arbor with it and keep it growing.
The Insectarium is complete! Let's head inside to take a look and talk to Mors.
The new Neighbor asked me to choose a site for their home. I should open my Backpack and use their Building Kit to select a location.
I should collect lilies in three colors and craft Tricolor Potted Lilies.
I should hear Bhadra's thoughts on the decor and furniture at his new place.
I've arrived at the Camp! Esassani, Glenn, and Mobai are setting things up to brew some tea. Let's talk to each of them to get to know them better.
Living here is what gives meaning to the planet's growth. I should go find Mobai and pick up my Building Kit.
Go to the Camp, pick out different types of sea fish and shore-dwellers from my Backpack, and settle them into the Eco-Tank for ecological observation.
Second Batch of Shop Building Materials
I've handed the materials to Glenn. All materials are ready! Time to check in with him for my reward and discuss what comes next for the shop.
How wonderful it is to watch the meteor shower with everyone! I should talk to Mobai to end the gathering when I'm ready for a break.
As more and more creatures settle in the Ecohouse, Mors seems to be planning an expansion. I'll go talk to him.
I've handed the dishes for the Neighbors to Mobai. I should talk to him about my thoughts, then collect the payment.
Yunguo got her lost talisman back, and it looks like she's discovered something new... I'll go talk to her about it.
The sprouting of the Lucaseed brings flowers and wildgrass to life on the planet. I should gather some and bring them to Mobai.
I returned home to find Mobai, Yunguo, and Esassani coming over to celebrate. I should talk to Mobai about decorating and house ratings.
The house expansion is underway. I just need to wait for it to finish tomorrow.
I've finished the furniture! I should go talk to Mobai about how it turned out.
Give the Tricolor Potted Lilies to Mobai to decorate the Camp.
The Luca Arbor's Next Growth Stage
Would you like to build a house and create initial furniture?
Frostia seems to have something to discuss with me and sent a letter. I'll check my PuffPost Box and read it.
Thanks to Yunguo's efforts, the passion fruit turned out amazing. I'll go to her place and talk to her about it.
My new home is complete! Let's invite Mobai to take a look inside.
I've invited Isaki to live on my planet. Time to talk to Mobai to pick up Isaki's Building Kit.
The security system at the Omni-Gallery has logged several visits from Yunguo to the Aquarium. What's she up to? I should head over and find out.
The freshwater fish have been settled in the Eco-Tank! I should go ask Mobai what's next for the ecological observation.
The new shop might become the planet's future commercial hub. I should open my Backpack and use the Shop Building Kit to pick a spot.
The Luca Arbor's Next Growth Stage
Time to get up and talk to Mobai about how to "nurture a planet."
The planet is thriving, and Loomi Co. has launched a new service! I should head to the Camp and talk to Mobai to learn more.
I've saved up enough Dough. Now to purchase a new house from Loomi Mart's Housing Services.
Select different types of insects from the Backpack and settle them in the Eco-Tank for ecological observation.
My Neighbor's Planette has reached Growth Stage 6 and produced a unique Luca Fruit. I'll place it on my Luca Arbor, so my planet can now reflect a bit of its scenery.
The visitor seems to have fainted from hunger? I'd better give him some fruit or a dish to help him recover his strength.
Visit Medowlyn's home and see what she thinks of the new furniture.
Delete initial furniture and create quest furniture
Visit Frostia's home and see what she thinks of the new furniture.
Isaki asked me to pick a spot for his new home. I should check my backpack and use Isaki's Building Kit.
Mors has given me an Ecohouse to provide creatures with a better habitat. I'll open Backpack and pick a spot with the Ecohouse Building Kit.
In Loomi Mart's Housing Services, I'll purchase the "Charming Cottage" to expand my home.

Esassani has finished repairing the car, but we still need materials to decorate it. I can pick some flowers from the meadows nearby, then head to the beach to collect some broken seashells and coral branches.
Let's Go Watch the Meteor Shower
Mors and I are doing some ecological observation together. Let's settle more kinds of freshwater fish, insects, saltwater fish, and shore-dwellers.
The Ecohouse is finally complete! I'll go check it out and see what Mors has planned next for ecological observation.

Omne vivum, sapientia temporum!
Settle more insect species to grow the collection.
I've given the new furniture to Bhadra. Might be nice to stop by and see how he likes it.
The Ecohouse is ready for construction! It will be completed tomorrow.
I'll set up a Crop Harvest Fair blueprint outdoors and host a fair to showcase any crops I've harvested.
I'm helping Dorjelang prepare his furniture: Buy a Lotusbreeze Lantern from Glenn, and craft a Cloudherder's Chair and a medium-sized utility table at the DIY Bench.
Wait for the Passion Fruit to Ripen
I should bring the shooting star to Frostia. Maybe she'll discover something interesting?
A Planette streaked across the sky and landed on my planet. I should find the mysterious visitor on the beach and talk to them.
I'll open my Backpack and find a spot to place the Blueprint: Crop Harvest Fair.
I just harvested some mutated crops! Time to show them to Yunguo and talk about the experience.
Dorjelang is setting up the new furniture at home. I'll drop by and hear how he likes it.
The Eco-Tank looks full, so Mors ordered an Ecohouse to house more creatures. I'll talk to him and pick up the Ecohouse Building Kit.
I met a new Neighbor on a Starsea Voyage. I should increase our Bond Level by completing Neighbor events and giving them daily gifts. Then, I can invite them to settle.
With my new home in order, I'll return to the Camp and ask Mobai what else I can do here.
Some Neighbors who aren't great at cooking are happy to pay well for a proper meal. I'll go talk to Mobai about the new order.
Frostia is setting up the new furniture at home. I'll drop by and hear how she likes it.
The new Neighbor is getting ready to move to the planet. Time to collect their Building Kit from Mobai.
I'll place the Blueprint: Food Fair outdoors on the planet and host a fair to showcase my dishes.
Glenn seems to be preparing something for the shop. I should go talk to him.
Observing the creatures on this planet might help me better understand the environment here. I'll equip my insect net from the Tool Wheel and catch different types of insects around grass and trees.
I need to learn the Inspo Card: Maizeglow Table Lamp, prepare the materials, and craft it at the DIY Bench.
The Luca Arbor's growth is the growth of the planet. I should talk to Mobai about the new changes.
I'll place the Blueprint: Cozy Feast outdoors on the planet and host a feast to showcase my dishes.
Medowlyn is setting up the new furniture at home. I'll drop by and hear how she likes it.
Listen for island arrival dialogue trigger
Bhadra has sketched the blueprint for his idea of the Luminescent Stone House. I should collect his house order from Loomi Mart Housing Services and help build the Luminescent Stone House.
Bhadra and Sani are chatting at the Camp. I should go see what they're up to.
Time to go home and lie down for a good rest. If there's no bed around, I'll need to craft or buy one and place it in my house.
Frostia, who loves studying mysterious phenomena, has always been curious about shooting stars. I should help her catch a few for research.
After a busy day, it's time for a short break. The others are getting ready for the gathering. Talk to Mobai to start it.
Talk to Esassani to learn about how to go on expeditions and head to the Galactic Bazaar.
The shop's under construction and should be ready by tomorrow.
A bigger place and more space for only 1,200 Dough! I'll save up and purchase a new house from Loomi Mart's Housing Services.
My first day here ended with dazzling fireworks! Mobai, Glenn, and Yunguo seem to have prepared a surprise. Let's go talk to them.
The Cozy Feast was a success! I'll go talk to Mobai about how it went.
I should talk to Bhadra about how he's feeling in his home. Maybe he's thinking about expanding it?
Bring the mysterious malnourished fruit to the Omni-Gallery.
Find Mobai to learn how to settle on the planet.
Esassani seems to be repairing a car. I should go to the Camp and talk to her about my new ride.
I need to water the wheat and tomatoes every day and wait for them to mature. By mixing crops, I have a better chance of growing mutated ones.
Mobai has found the perfect spot on the hill to watch the meteor shower. I should place a ramp or use the pogo stick to reach the hilltop and talk to him.
Build the House and Create Furniture?
I've given the new furniture to Bhadra. Might be nice to stop by and see how he likes it.

In his design request, Bhadra listed the furniture he wants crafted for the Luminescent Stone House. He's also hoping for custom pieces that match his preferences. I should head to his home, open Homi Decor, and start decorating to finish the job.
I've brought the new furniture to Frostia. Time to stop by her place and hear what she thinks.
Yunguo is on her way to ask Mors about the mysterious, malnourished fruit. I should bring it along and talk with them.
Collect fruits for the tea gathering with Esassani. Shake the fruit trees around and pick up the fallen fruit.
From an environmental science point of view, the location of the Ecohouse is just perfect. Let's go to the Ecohouse and talk to Mors.
Archiboo came because of Luca, and the planet is brimming with vitality. I should talk to Mobai about them.
The Luca Arbor's Next Growth Stage
I've found the perfect spot for Isaki's new home! Time to go to his new place and talk to him.
Bhadra's Thoughts on His New Home
Bhadra has posted a design request in Homi Decor for his Luminescent Stone House. I'll open the app on my phone and accept it.
After preparing the furniture Bhadra needs, I should go talk to him and hand them over.
Yunguo is crouching by the river, searching for something. I should go talk to her.
I've handed the materials to Glenn. Time to check in with him for my reward and discuss what comes next for the shop.
I just harvested some rice! Time to show it to Yunguo and talk about the experience.
Send Archiboos to help look after Neighbors' Planettes! In Starcove, help any Neighbor's Planette grow to Stage 6, the final growth stage.
The Omni-Gallery is still under construction and won't be ready until tomorrow. But I can still hand over any new creatures I catch to Mors as usual.
My Bond Level with Isaki has changed! I can invite him to settle via Starcove, or do it in person.
Frostia has something on her mind. She's invited me over to talk at her place.
First Batch of Shop Building Materials
First Batch of Shop Building Materials
I should see Esassani about going on a Starsea Voyage for encounters with new friends along the way.
I've got a new tool  a paint roller! Let's try it out on the ground outside.
Everything's ready for the meteor shower gathering! Time to head to the Camp and talk to Mobai to get it started.
Give the Tricolor Potted Lilies to Mobai to decorate the Camp, then talk to him about how it turned out.
The Luca Arbor's Next Growth Stage
Yunguo's figured something out from watching the crabs closely. I'll go talk to her and see what she discovered.
Glenn asked for my help collecting materials to build his shop. Time to grab my mattock, look for large ore deposits in the grass on the planet or Islets on Starsea Voyages, and mine some quartz.
The unique homes of my Neighbors are a part of what makes this planet so special. I should return to Camp, get a Jar of Luca from Mobai, and learn how I can help my Neighbors with their houses.
Mobai's Introduction CS + Choose Four Major
Setting Up for a Cozy Little Dinner Party
I've completed a Neighbor event for the planet's growth and collected a jar full of Luca. Time to water the Luca Arbor with it and keep it growing.
Would you like to build a house and create initial furniture?
I'm helping Frostia prepare her furniture: Buy a Red Panda Cushioned Chair from Glenn, and craft a Faintglow Stars Bookshelf and a medium-sized utility table at the DIY Bench.
With the Luca Arbor growing, mushrooms are sprouting all over the planet! Mobai suggested I cook up a mushroom dish and share it at the dinner party with the Neighbors.
Open Starcove and check the growth of Yunguo's Planette. Send Archiboos to help tend it and grow it to Stage 1.
I've decided to help Bhadra build the Luminescent Stone House. I should drop the required materials in the Community Crate by his door to prep for construction.
The Luca Arbor needs constant watering with Luca to grow. I should water it with the filled Jar of Luca.
Mobai is collecting Luca. I'll go ask how he's doing.
Talk to Esassani, and wait for her to modify the car and install the Lumia Battery.
Claim a free Lumia Battery from the Store on Loomi Mart.
Yunguo left her gift at the Camp. I'll bring her back there and talk to Mobai.
We've got plenty of adventures ahead of us. For now, let's go home and get some rest.

Mobai has found the perfect spot on the hill to watch the meteor shower. I'll set up the gathering area with tables, chairs, and lights to create a cozy space, then invite our Neighbors to change and join the event.
The Omni-Gallery is complete! I should step inside, check out the main hall, and talk to Mors.
I should increase my Bond Level with Isaki by completing Neighbor events and giving him daily gifts, then invite him to settle.
I need to learn Recipe: Fruit Medley Cake and Recipe: Crispy Grilled Fish. I can cook one of each dish with the oven on the cooking counter.
I should bring the Blue Mosaic Porcelain Bathtub, Fluffy Clouds Sofa, and a perfectly-sized table to Medowlyn.

The Luminescent Stone House is complete. With translucent fluorite glistening in the sunlight, it's unmistakably Bhadra's home. I should head to Bhadra's house and celebrate its completion at his doorstep.
My new home is complete! I'll head to the doorstep and talk to Mobai.
Yunguo mentioned there are some wild veggies growing nearby, but she can't seem to find any. I'll try to find some and bring them to her.
I should hand the flowers, broken seashells, and coral branches to Esassani to decorate the new car.
20 lilies have been planted on the main island
Setting Up for a Cozy Little Dinner Party
As the Luca Arbor grows, the planet brims with even more vitality, which has drawn Archiboos here. Mobai has put together a Life Guide full of tips for living here, and I can check it anytime.
There's a different kind of nature on the hill. I'll use the pogo stick to hop up and gather some blue flowers.
I can embellish the planet with a Luca Fruit. Time to hold Luca Fruit: Starlined Meadows and place it on the Luca Arbor.
My new home is fully decorated! Time to head back and request a house rating. Let's see if I can hit 350 points.
I'll open my Backpack and find a spot to place the Blueprint: Food Fair.

Visit Isaki's home and see what he thinks of the new furniture.

Check out how the new Luca works after it's placed, then talk to Mobai about how it feels to swap it in.

There's a special letter in my PuffPost Box, sent by Yunguo's Gran'mama. I should check the box and read it.

The planet is growing fast. When other planets pass nearby, I can drive over for a visit. Anyone who stops by mine will be listed on the station sign.
The newly formed beach is teeming with shore-dwellers. I'll equip the shellfish tongs from the Tool Wheel and catch a few.
When decorating outdoors, using blueprints with pre-arranged furniture sets is also an option. I'll buy the Blueprint: Twin Crescent Chairs from Loomi Mart.
When decorating outdoors, using Blueprints with pre-arranged furniture sets is also an option. I'll place the Blueprint: Twin Crescent Chairs outdoors on the planet.
When decorating outdoors, using Blueprints with pre-arranged furniture sets is also an option. I'll enjoy them with my Neighbors.
A better home calls for better decor. I'll craft or buy more furniture and set up my new place.
Mobai has set up a Cooking Counter at the Camp where I can make all kinds of dishes. To cook a Mushroom Soup, I'll need to gather some mushrooms first.
Esassani's waiting for me at the beach. I'll go talk to her.
Crop prices fluctuate and change depending on market needs. I should talk to Glenn to learn more about crop purchases.
Every day, crop prices vary from planet to planet. I'll go to Glenn to check out Today's Greenmarket and sell some crops.
The scarecrow is a trusty farming companion that helps check the nearby fields for watering and fertilizing needs. I'll place an Ol' Trusty Scarecrow outdoors on the planet.

Time to check it out.

Yunguo and Passion Fruit's Casual Chat
Show the rare beetle to Isaki
